      int QuantizePVT.calc_xmin(LameGlobalFlags gfp, III_psy_ratio ratio, GrInfo cod_info, float[] pxmin)
      Calculate the allowed distortion for each scalefactor band, as determined by the psychoacoustic model. xmin(sb) = ratio(sb) * en(sb) / bw(sb)

      returns number of sfb's with energy > ATH
